name: Gail VS Snail
description:
Gail VS Snail is an infinite skateboarding game. At least, it would be infinite, if there wasn't a massive snail behind you gaining speed at exponential rates. You can outrun it, but only for a bit. How far can you get before succumbing to the inevitable? Good luck! Note: This game was made for Ludum Dare 50, where the theme was Delay The Inevitable. Credits:

Art - SUBSOMBRE

Audio - Someone Somewhere
